page.title: 11Where I live
page.content:
I live at 3 Didsbury Close and I asked my Dad why did you want to live here? He said he wanted to live near his work. The advantages of living here are well designed houses, good road layout and nearness to shops and schools. The disadvantages are small gardens and the area could be improved by more local jobs. A closer sports centre would improve the amenities in the area. You would describe the area as pleasant with modern houses, shops and schools. I think the area is O.K. but there's not many places with trees to play in.
Caroline Wicks, age 10. Sprites Junior School.
